Docs.summary: Permissions for local notifications, as controlled by the application user.

remarks.para: Starting with iOS 8, users must give explicit permission for apps that wish to respond to local notifications.

Prior to attempting to send local notifications, devs must request permission from the application user to manipulate the app icon badge, play a sound, or display an alert (see ). Typically, this is done in the overridden method:
